types.name: vk_platform
types.body: #include "vk_platform.h"

types.name: VK_MAKE_VERSION
VK_VERSION_MAJOR
types.body:
// DEPRECATED: This define is deprecated. VK_API_VERSION_MAJOR should be used instead.
#define VK_VERSION_MAJOR(version) ((uint32_t)(version) >> 22U)

types.name: VK_VERSION_MINOR
types.body:
// DEPRECATED: This define is deprecated. VK_API_VERSION_MINOR should be used instead.
#define VK_VERSION_MINOR(version) (((uint32_t)(version) >> 12U) & 0x3FFU)

types.name: VK_VERSION_PATCH
types.body:
// DEPRECATED: This define is deprecated. VK_API_VERSION_PATCH should be used instead.
#define VK_VERSION_PATCH(version) ((uint32_t)(version) & 0xFFFU)

types.name: VK_MAKE_API_VERSION
types.body:
#define VK_MAKE_API_VERSION(variant, major, minor, patch) \
    ((((uint32_t)(variant)) << 29U) | (((uint32_t)(major)) << 22U) | (((uint32_t)(minor)) << 12U) | ((uint32_t)(patch)))

types.name: VK_API_VERSION_VARIANT
types.body: #define VK_API_VERSION_VARIANT(version) ((uint32_t)(version) >> 29U)

types.name: VK_API_VERSION_MAJOR
types.body: #define VK_API_VERSION_MAJOR(version) (((uint32_t)(version) >> 22U) & 0x7FU)

types.name: VK_API_VERSION_MINOR
types.body: #define VK_API_VERSION_MINOR(version) (((uint32_t)(version) >> 12U) & 0x3FFU)

types.name: VK_API_VERSION_PATCH
types.body: #define VK_API_VERSION_PATCH(version) ((uint32_t)(version) & 0xFFFU)

types.name: VKSC_API_VARIANT
types.body:
// Vulkan SC variant number
#define VKSC_API_VARIANT 1

types.name: VK_API_VERSION
types.body:
// DEPRECATED: This define has been removed. Specific version defines (e.g. VK_API_VERSION_1_0), or the VK_MAKE_VERSION macro, should be used instead.
//#define VK_API_VERSION VK_MAKE_API_VERSION(0, 1, 0, 0) // Patch version should always be set to 0

types.name: VK_API_VERSION_1_0
types.body:
// Vulkan 1.0 version number
#define VK_API_VERSION_1_0 VK_MAKE_API_VERSION(0, 1, 0, 0)// Patch version should always be set to 0

types.name: VK_API_VERSION_1_1
types.body:
// Vulkan 1.1 version number
#define VK_API_VERSION_1_1 VK_MAKE_API_VERSION(0, 1, 1, 0)// Patch version should always be set to 0

types.name: VK_API_VERSION_1_2
types.body:
// Vulkan 1.2 version number
#define VK_API_VERSION_1_2 VK_MAKE_API_VERSION(0, 1, 2, 0)// Patch version should always be set to 0

types.name: VK_API_VERSION_1_3
types.body:
// Vulkan 1.3 version number
#define VK_API_VERSION_1_3 VK_MAKE_API_VERSION(0, 1, 3, 0)// Patch version should always be set to 0

types.name: VKSC_API_VERSION_1_0
types.body:
// Vulkan SC 1.0 version number
#define VKSC_API_VERSION_1_0 VK_MAKE_API_VERSION(VKSC_API_VARIANT, 1, 0, 0)// Patch version should always be set to 0

types.name: VK_HEADER_VERSION
types.body:
// Version of this file
#define VK_HEADER_VERSION 270

types.name: VK_HEADER_VERSION_COMPLETE
types.body:
// Complete version of this file
#define VK_HEADER_VERSION_COMPLETE VK_MAKE_API_VERSION(0, 1, 3, VK_HEADER_VERSION)

types.name: VK_DEFINE_HANDLE
types.body: #define VK_DEFINE_HANDLE(object) typedef struct object##_T* object;

types.name: VK_USE_64_BIT_PTR_DEFINES
types.body:
#ifndef VK_USE_64_BIT_PTR_DEFINES
    #if defined(__LP64__) || defined(_WIN64) || (defined(__x86_64__) && !defined(__ILP32__) ) || defined(_M_X64) || defined(__ia64) || defined (_M_IA64) || defined(__aarch64__) || defined(__powerpc64__) || (defined(__riscv) && __riscv_xlen == 64)
        #define VK_USE_64_BIT_PTR_DEFINES 1
    #else
        #define VK_USE_64_BIT_PTR_DEFINES 0
    #endif
#endif

types.name: VK_NULL_HANDLE
types.body:
#ifndef VK_DEFINE_NON_DISPATCHABLE_HANDLE
    #if (VK_USE_64_BIT_PTR_DEFINES==1)
        #if (defined(__cplusplus) && (__cplusplus >= 201103L)) || (defined(_MSVC_LANG) && (_MSVC_LANG >= 201103L))
            #define VK_NULL_HANDLE nullptr
        #else
            #define VK_NULL_HANDLE ((void*)0)
        #endif
    #else
        #define VK_NULL_HANDLE 0ULL
    #endif
#endif
#ifndef VK_NULL_HANDLE
    #define VK_NULL_HANDLE 0
#endif

types.name: VK_DEFINE_NON_DISPATCHABLE_HANDLE
types.body:
#ifndef VK_DEFINE_NON_DISPATCHABLE_HANDLE
    #if (VK_USE_64_BIT_PTR_DEFINES==1)
        #define VK_DEFINE_NON_DISPATCHABLE_HANDLE(object) typedef struct object##_T *object;
    #else
        #define VK_DEFINE_NON_DISPATCHABLE_HANDLE(object) typedef uint64_t object;
    #endif
#endif
